Articles.Content: My sandbox has a million craft files in it and the GUI is a bit inefficient. My suggestion is to make the GUI have folders, a search bar, and (in the VAB/SPH) look like the launchpad/runway GUI.
Agreed, the list gets bloated so fast, even in career mode. Folders to organize my craft would be awesome.
Organize them at least in the same way as crafts in flight see organized, like probes and rovers and planes and so on.
You can also try and use different symbols to sort things out. Like AAA for the first batch of files and BBB, CCC and so on....
This would be even better in combination with another suggestion.
